Welcome to pyslave’s documentation!¶

Pyslave is a package to script experiment in Python. It contains :

  • “Magic” functions to be used in the IPython shell. These functions allow to easily load instruments and launch scripts.
  • A GUI to monitor the running script and interact with it.
  • Python Instrument drivers

To load pyslave :

from pyslave import *

Contents¶

  • IPython shell magic commands
    • Instrument functions (shortcuts to the instruments module)
    • Slave functions (run and interact with scripts )
    • Quick measurement functions
    • Miscellaneous functions
  • Scripting language
    • Comments interpreted by slave
  • instruments Module
  • data Module
  • Instrument Drivers
    • Rohde Schwarz instrument drivers
    • Agilent instrument drivers
    • Yokogawa instrument drivers
    • Standford Research instrument drivers
    • Lecroy instrument drivers
    • NI-DAQ instrument drivers
